SongLyrics.JpnStr: 明日[あした]、今日[きょう]よりも好[す]きになれる 溢[あふ]れる想[おも]いが止[と]まらない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Tomorrow, I will love you more than today. My overflowing feelings won't stop.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今[いま]もこんなに好[す]きでいるのに 言葉[ことば]に出来[でき]ない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even now, I love you so much, yet I can't put it into words.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]のくれた日々[ひび]が積[つ]み重[かさ]なり 過[す]ぎ去[さ]った日々[ひび]2人[ふたり]歩[ある]いた『軌跡[きせき]』
SongLyrics.EngStr: The days you gave me piled up, and the days we walked together became a 'miracle.'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]らの出逢[であ]いがもし偶然[ぐうぜん]ならば? 運命[うんめい]ならば? 君[きみ]に巡[めぐ]り合[あ]えた それって『奇跡[きせき]』
SongLyrics.EngStr: If our meeting was by chance? By fate? Meeting you, isn't that a 'miracle'?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 2人[ふたり]寄[よ]り添[そ]って歩[ある]いて 永久[とわ]の愛[あい]を形[かたち]にして
SongLyrics.EngStr: We walk together, making our eternal love take shape.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いつまでも君[きみ]の横[よこ]で 笑[わら]っていたくて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to keep laughing by your side forever.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: アリガトウや Ah[アー] 愛[あい]してるじゃまだ足[た]りないけど
SongLyrics.EngStr: "Thank you" or "I love you" isn't enough, but...

SongLyrics.JpnStr: せめて言[い]わせて「幸[しあわ]せです」と
SongLyrics.EngStr: At least let me say, 'I'm happy.'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いつも君[きみ]の右[みぎ]の手[て]の平[ひら]を ただ僕[ぼく]の左[ひだり]の手[て]の平[ひら]が
SongLyrics.EngStr: Your right palm, my left palm just holds it.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そっと包[つつ]んでくそれだけで ただ愛[あい]を感[かん]じていた
SongLyrics.EngStr: Just wrapping it gently, that alone made me feel love.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 日々[ひび]の中[なか]で 小[ちい]さな幸[しあわ]せ 見[み]つけ重[かさ]ね ゆっくり歩[ある]いた『軌跡[きせき]』
SongLyrics.EngStr: In our days together, we found and piled up little happiness as we slowly walked, a 'miracle.'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]らの出逢[であ]いは大[おお]きな世界[せかい]で 小[ちい]さな出来事[できごと] 巡[めぐ]り合[あ]えた それって『奇跡[きせき]』
SongLyrics.EngStr: Our meeting was a small event in the vast world, yet we met by chance. Isn't that a 'miracle'?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: うまく行[い]かない日[ひ]だって 2人[ふたり]で居[い]れば晴[は]れだって!
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even on days when things don't go well, if we're together, the sun will shine!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 強[つよ]がりや寂[さび]しさも 忘[わす]れられるから
SongLyrics.EngStr: Because I can forget my loneliness and pretenses.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]は君[きみ]でなら 僕[ぼく]でいれるから!
SongLyrics.EngStr: Because when I'm with you, I can be myself!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だからいつも そばに居[い]てよ『愛[いと]しい君[きみ]へ』
SongLyrics.EngStr: So please, always stay by my side, 'my beloved.'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 2人[ふたり]フザけあった帰[かえ]り道[みち] それも大切[たいせつ]な僕[ぼく]らの日々[ひび]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even the playful walks home together, they too are our precious days.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 「想[おも]いよ届[とど]け!!!」と伝[つた]えた時[とき]に 初[はじ]めて見[み]せた表情[ひょうじょう]の君[きみ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: When I told you, 'Let my feelings reach you!!!,' for the first time, I saw your expression.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 少[すこ]し間[ま]が空[あ]いて 君[きみ]がうなずいて 僕[ぼく]らの心[こころ] 満[み]たされてく愛[あい]で
SongLyrics.EngStr: After a brief pause, you nodded, and our hearts were filled with love.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]らまだ旅[たび]の途中[とちゅう]で またこれから先[さき]も 何十年[なんじゅうねん]続[つづ]いていけるような未来[みらい]ヘ
SongLyrics.EngStr: We are still in the middle of our journey, but ahead, we can have a future that lasts for decades.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 例[たと]えばほら 明日[あした]を見失[みうしな]いそうに 僕[ぼく]らなったとしても、、、
SongLyrics.EngStr: For example, even if we lose sight of tomorrow...

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 2人[ふたり]寄[よ]り添[そ]って歩[ある]いて 永久[とわ]の愛[あい]を形[かたち]にして
SongLyrics.EngStr: We walk together, making our eternal love take shape.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いつまでも君[きみ]の横[よこ]で 笑[わら]っていたくて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to keep laughing by your side forever.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: アリガトウや Ah[アー] 愛[あい]してるじゃまだ足[た]りないけど
SongLyrics.EngStr: "Thank you" or "I love you" isn't enough, but...

SongLyrics.JpnStr: せめて言[い]わせて「幸[しあわ]せです」と
SongLyrics.EngStr: At least let me say, 'I'm happy.'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: うまく行[い]かない日[ひ]だって 2人[ふたり]で居[い]れば晴[は]れだって!
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even on days when things don't go well, if we're together, the sun will shine!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 喜[よろこ]びや悲[かなし]みも 全[すべ]て分[わ]け合[あ]える
SongLyrics.EngStr: We can share both joy and sorrow.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]が居[い]るから 生[い]きていけるから!
SongLyrics.EngStr: Because you're here, I can keep on living!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だからいつも そばに居[い]てよ『愛[いと]しい君[きみ]へ』最後[さいご]の一秒[いちびょう]まで
SongLyrics.EngStr: So please, always stay by my side, 'my beloved,' until the last second.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 明日[あした]、今日[きょう]より笑顔[えがお]になれる 君[きみ]が居[い]るだけで そう思[おも]えるから
SongLyrics.EngStr: Tomorrow, I can smile more than today, just because you're here, that's how I feel.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何十年[なんじゅうねん] 何百年[なんびゃくねん] 何千年[なんぜんねん] 時[とき]を超[こ]えよう 君[きみ]を愛[あい]してる
SongLyrics.EngStr: For decades, hundreds of years, thousands of years, let’s surpass time. I love you.

ListVocab: 積み重なる-つみかさなる
